iati-activity.title: Empowering Communities for Early TB Case Detection and treatment among poor people in Mulanje District Malawi
iati-activity.description: The project aims to increase the number of people being tested and successfully treated for TB. This is through increasing the public's knowledge of TB through awareness raising activities; improving testing at local health centres through training of microscopists; improving treatment success rates by providing support/counselling to patients and their families and through supporting nutrition and veg garden projects.
